'''Four-Causal Correction''' is [[Alhaitham]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If the same hit that triggers this passive also triggers a Projection Attack, the Projection Attack triggered will take into account the Chisel-Light Mirror gained from the passive.
